text: Chaim Dov Keller (1930August 17, 2020) was an American Haredi rabbi, Talmudic scholar, and journalist. He was the co-founder and co-rosh yeshiva ("dean") of the Telshe Yeshiva in Chicago.Dei'ah veDibur - Information & Insight - NEWS He wrote in Haredi newspapers such as the Yated Ne'eman in the United States. He was born in New York City. Keller was diagnosed with COVID-19 in March 2020. He died on August 17, 2020 in Chicago, aged 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Chicago Category:American rabbis Category:Educators from Chicago Category:Journalists from New York City Category:Journalists from Chicago Category:Educators from New York City
title: Chaim Dov Keller
